---

```{r}
df <- readr::read_csv(here::here("dir_demo/data/clean_flights.csv"))
```

```{r}
mod <- glm(delayed ~ month + poly(sched_dep_time, 4) + poly(distance, 4), 
           family = "binomial", data = df)
summary(mod)
```

```{r}
saveRDS(mod, here::here("dir_demo/models/log_reg.rds"))
```
